alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 4:30PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying area is occurring. Some roads are inundated with water, including over a foot or more of water over the airport access road. Homes and other structures in lower parts of the village may have water surround or flood them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 400 PM AKDT Wednesday, a large volume of water from snowmelt continues to move down the Yukon River. Water levels on the Yukon River at Dawson City and Eagle continue to slowly rise, so the Yukon River at Stevens Village will remain high into next week. Stevens Village is seeing higher water than observed during breakup. - http://weather.gov/aprfc If you live near or along the Yukon River at Stevens Village stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
